title: Wow! 70-YO Bareilly Man's Modified Bike Comes With An ATM, Music & Starts When Called 'Tarzan'
text:
A mini ATM on a bike? A bike that also starts with just one voice command? Believe it or not, such a bike exits!

This bike named Tarzan is going viral on social media, not because it is expensive or something like that but because of its crazy features!

The video of the bike is also going viral on social media which shows the vehicle working on the voice commands of its owner. The motorcycle also has a voice command ATM and even plays music on voice command. Tarzan’s engine also starts on a voice command and parking the vehicle is also very easy.

Mohammad Sayeed is the man who owns the bike and in the video the man who is making the video comes in the front of the vehicle, after that a light blinks and then the man gives commands to the mini ATM which then dispenses a Rs 5 coin.

Sayeed also claims that it the first such ATM that works on a voice command. He then demonstrates that the bike can be taken off from the stand very easily and park itself automatically. The man then gives a voice command to play music and uses his hand to stop it.

Sayeed also tells him that he is from Bareilly in Uttar Pradesh.
